name: Save The Frames Obstacle Course
description:
Made for the Go Godot Jam.

This is an unusual game where you are tasked with getting to the end of the course (yellow cylinder) before your computer can no longer handle the exponentially growing number of objects.

Move with WAD.
Break with S.
Jump with SPACE.
Use item with F or Mouse Click.
Cycle through items with TAB or Mouse Wheel.

All assets and programming done by 1 person in three days. Ideation done with a team of 3.
